Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.petgame.ui.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()
      Constructs the inventory screen containing a hashmap to store each inventory object.
